name: Large Braided Gardenia
description: The Braided Gardenia is a sophisticated addition to any garden or indoor space, featuring beautifully braided trunks and glossy, dark green leaves.

name: Olive Tree
description: Imagine a touch of the Mediterranean in your own backyard. The Olive Tree is not just a plant; it's a passport to a world of rustic charm and serene beauty.

name: Calamondin Tree
description: Weâ€™re very excited to offer the delightful Calamondin tree. Native to the Philippines, the Calamondin (also known as Calamansi) produces an abundance of small, tart fruits .

name: Meyer Lemon Bush
description: This isn't just any lemon bush; it's a sweeter, juicier, and more resilient variety that's perfect for both green thumbs and gardening newbies.

name: Key Lime Bush
description: This compact plant is perfect for patios, sunny kitchen windows, or even your garden bed. It's not just a plant; it's a ticket to homemade limeade and zesty culinary adventures.

name: Thuja Green Giant
description: This evergreen is not just a giant by name; it's a towering beacon of lush green that'll give your garden the privacy screen it deserves.

name: Fiddle-Leaf Fig Tree
description: a plant that's not just a pretty face but a master of indoor charm. With its iconic, violin-shaped leaves, this beauty is sure to strike a chord with plant lovers and interior design enthusiasts alike.

name: Black Knight Bush
description: This hardy shrub is not just a pretty face; it's a butterfly magnet that will bring your garden to life!

name: Bloomerang Lilac Bush
description: The Bloomerang Lilac Bush is not your average lilac. This deciduous darling is a re-blooming marvel, ensuring your garden is never without the sweet scent and vibrant purple hues that only a lilac can provide.
